text: Joseph Danlami Bagobiri (8 November 1957 â€“ 27 February 2018) was a Nigerian Roman Catholic bishop. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1983, Bagobiri served as bishop of Kafanchan from 1995 until his death in 2018. Bagobiri died on 27 February 2018 at the age of 61. == References == Category:1957 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Nigerian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Joseph Bagobiri
